data.actual_result: it doesn't, the number stays. reacting again doesn't changes anything
data.expected_result: When you connect, it should update the reaction amount
data.short_description: when you spam a reaction while being in the "connecting" mode increases the amount nearly every time you click on it
data.steps_to_repro: - quit WiFi, so that you get a "connecting" status on the top when you start Discord - spam a reaction while being in it - be "connected"(status bar should be away)
